strings.Value: "When I fell… I saw the faces of those I've lost…"
"When death draws near, you start to wonder — is it possible to reunite with your lost family, somewhere beyond life?"
"Those dear to us who we've lost — they're always with us, in our thoughts and in our grief. They'll always be there for you, Ekun."
"You still breathe, but you dream of meeting dead people! Stop talking crap!"
"Your losses were terrible, yet you remain strong. When I see this, my own grief and sorrow seems to lessen."
"When you die, you will see and feel nothing. Trust my experience."
"I know these thoughts... But what could they say to you, if you met them before your time? 'Go back, and return only when you are a gray old man!'"
"I know these thoughts... But what could they say to you, if you met them before your time? 'Go back, and return only when you are a gray old man!'"
